title: Real2 Addition Function
description: This function performs addition operations involving a Real2 derived type and a REAL type. It updates the Real2 output structure based on the provided inputs.
name: R2_ADD

input.name: X
input.description: A derived type that contains two real numbers, RX and R1.

input.name: Y
input.description: A real number that will be added to the components of the Real2 input.

output.name: R2_ADD
output.description: The output structure of type Real2 containing the results of the addition operations.

return_value.description: The resulting Real2 structure after performing the addition.

fields.name: RX
fields.description: The result of adding Y, X.R1, and X.RX.

fields.name: R1
fields.description: The result of computing temp minus RX, plus Y, and X.R1.
